Description: Fragment of a furnishing textile in wool and some linen. The design is organized in bands with, from the top, a semi-circle of stylized plants in white on brown, enclosing, on a blue ground, a green cruciform plant motif with red and white flowers; in the spandrels, similar motifs on dark green; a narrow band in blue, white and brown, the repeating motif, again, plant-like; a poorly preserved band, multicoloured on a white ground; a band with repeating motifs in white on a red ground; another, wider, multi-coloured band.
